Name: Rheksetor
About the game: Explore the world of Rheksetor! Harvest resources, build a base of operations, and defend your city! Rheksetor is a real time city defense game with classic RTS, city building, and tower defense roots, and many different planned and potential features. Current Features / Mechanics: Multiplayer co-op via Steam Solo mode Harvest vegetation and minerals from the world Simple plot-based base-building system with building preview menu Elegant, streamlined interface for smooth gameplay / interaction Planned Features: A powerful resource system allowing devices to produce, store, and process resources for the player Transport vehicles and harvesting craft, with garages / hangars to store them Wider range of zone types, offering different aesthetics and challenges Various loot drops to customize and improve your colony (including set items) Various enemies which will challenge your foothold in the world Potential Features: Combat mechanics that fit the theme of each element (frost slows, fire burns over time, blood drains, etc) Tech trees for structures, allowing a wider range of progression choices Aesthetic theme packs to personalize your experience A rich story driven campaign (likely) special themed updates for major holidays
Meta Title: Rheksetor: Jan 2, 2018, Trokardia and Full Overview
